>> I have a very large matrix with columns that have some of their
>> entries as zero
>>
>>
>> A small example if a=
>>
>>         [,1]  [,2]  [,3]  [,4]

>>     [,3] 2     0     3     5
>>     [,4] 0     4     0     0
>>
